product_name: freshSugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackFresh's Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm is an intensive lip treatment that moisturizes extra dry lips for 24 hours and is clinically proven to repair the look of damaged lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsRepair the look of dry, damaged lipsDeeply moisturize for 24 hoursDeliver a plump, healthy lookKey IngredientsSugar is scientifically proven to have a long-lasting hydrating effectHyaluronic acid filling spheres help make the lips appear fullerSea fennel helps to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles and define the lip areaOrange extract is rich with antioxidants that help protect the lipsResearch ResultsClinically proven to repair the appearance of lips****Proven to intensely moisturize for 24 hours*100% agreed it relieves & soothes dry lips**94% reported improved elasticity**94% noticed improved smoothness after 1 use**Dermatologist tested*****instrumental test, 30 subjects**self-assessment, 62 subjects, 4 weeks***self-assessment by scoring, 30 subjects, 4 weeks****clinical assessment 30 subjects, 4 weeksItem 2609915How To UseApply throughout the day as needed.IngredientsCera Alba (beeswax), Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Seed Oil, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ricinus Communis (castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Decyl Esters, Vitis Vinifera (grape) Seed Oil, Parfum (fragrance), Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Ribes Nigrum (black Currant) Seed Oil, Cera Carnauba (copernicia Cerifera (carnauba) Wax), Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Triolein, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Glyceryl Dioleate, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ethyl Vanillin, Limonene, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply throughout the day as needed.

reviews.headline: Didn't stay on my lips for long
reviews.comments: I usually like their products, but I can't recommend this lip care if you are looking for something to help with very dry lips. It doesn't have much staying power. I had to reapply it often so not as advertised.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: It works really well. Once a day is all you need.

reviews.headline: Nothing special
reviews.comments: It is just a chapstick. I pike it contains some good ingredients. Packaging is perfect.

reviews.headline: good, but not necessary
reviews.comments: this is a nice lip balm. it has a sugary citrusy scent, which i enjoy. if you have money, are already in the market for high end products, and don't care too much about overpaying for things i don't think you'll regret this purchase, but if you're somebody with a more limited budget, you'll do just fine with a more affordable lip balm. even though i like it, i don't see myself repurchasing because it is expensive especially when lip balm is something i go through so quickly

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I was convinced by the reviews of this and was not disappointed. Absolutely love it and will continue to buy it. I have tried a lot of lip products and this is definitely now at the top of the list.

reviews.headline: Fresh, I was ready to be wowed.
reviews.comments: I have dry lips, due to medications. Ive used Fresh lip balm for decades! Regular is better.

reviews.headline: Hydrating. Smells nice. No taste.
reviews.comments:
Hydrating. Nice light scent. No taste. I don't like a lip balm that has a taste so for me that's a bonus. I use the Sugar Lip Polish several nights a week. I apply this afterwards before bed. I use this every night. My lips where extremely dry but this definitely has made a big difference. 
In the morning my lips feel hydrated and there is still a bit of the balm still on my lips. I use an extremely light swipe under my daytime lip products.

reviews.headline: It is Okay
reviews.comments: Don't expect a miracle and you won't be disappointed….good chapstick

reviews.headline: My lips feel so rejeuvenated
reviews.comments: About a year ago, I noticed my lips started to show very deep lines and looked awful when I tried to wear lipstick.  It wasn't so much and issue of me needing lip balm on a moment to moment basis, but I needed some kind of regime to get my lips to look fuller and smoother.  After doing a little research I decided to go with fresh Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment and the Laneige Sleeping Mask.  I use the mask at night when I remember, but the important thing is that I put the fresh Sugar on every morning before doing my makeup.  My lips look and feel so much better it's crazy.  It really has plumped and smoothed out my lips.  And the results were fairly quick.  It has such a nice smooth texture. It doesn't feel waxy or thick, but it isn't oily or thin either.  It's velvety and it sinks in, but also creates a nice barrier of protection.  It may be the very first lip balm that I've every used until it was completely gone.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: Ive tried several lip balms and this is my favorite. Great smell, lightweight, and moisturizing! It lasted me about 3 months using morning and night so was worth the price. I would be careful about storing it in a car or with you on a hot day. It softened pretty quickly in the heat.

reviews.headline: no other chapstick compares, its worth the price
reviews.comments: i have spent years trying to find any chapstick that compares to this that is at least a little bit less expensive but it doesnt exist... yes its expensive so be careful to buy it, you will NEED it after and have to add chapstick to your budget

reviews.headline: Best Lip Balm ever
reviews.comments: I've tried many lip balms over the years. I bought this single but highly recommend their tinted balms too.

reviews.headline: I've purchased this again and again!
reviews.comments: There's a reason this gets all the stars! It truly is the best lip balm out there!! Worth every penny! I've tried others and just go back to this amazing product!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: Love this product.  Great daytime moisturizer for the lips!

reviews.headline: expensive but worth it
reviews.comments:
by far my favorite lip balm, it feels so amazing and leaves my lips soft for hours unlike cheap chap sticks

DO NOT try the other sugar lip therapy products that have pigment though, they're god awful and very drying on the lips

reviews.headline: Not My Favorite
reviews.comments: I was gifted Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm, and I am almost out. I went to Ulta looking for more, only to find they don't carry it. Fresh Sugar Lip Balm was recommended to me and I was told by an associate that it was much better than Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm. I went ahead and bought it as well as a tinted version. I'm very disappointed and feel like I wasted money. Fresh Sugar is completely different than Summer Fridays. It is slippery and I have to keep applying to even feel it on my lips. The texture doesn't feel moisturizing to me. It's just not my thing.

reviews.headline: Number One Favorite
reviews.comments: Life-changing levels of hydration with natural plumping over time.

reviews.headline: Cure to my chapstick addiction
reviews.comments: I am the type of person that applies chapstick about 20 times a day because my lips always feel dry. I've tried regular chapstick, carmex, blistex, etc. This is the only one that makes my lips feel actually hydrated. Only had to apply 5 times today!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: The reviews did not disappoint. Lips feel great after first use. I have it by my nightstand and use every night. Going to order a second one to have at the office.

reviews.headline: Good but not worth the $
reviews.comments: Makes my lips feel so soft but there isnt a lot of product, it only lasted about 6 weeks so IMO not worth almost $30

perfect balm for a perfect pair
perfect balm for a perfect pair

faceoff_positive.comments: I rarely review products but I'm dropping this a glowing review as it has transformed mine and my husband's lips. He has terrible chapped lips and won't keep using ANY other lip balm. I used many different brands balms with varied results but nothing has been as good as Fresh. I bought a mini on a whim a while back and hadn't tried it until recently. What a mistake! I used it for a few days and my lips stopped peeling so quickly! I had become so used to having to coax the dead dry skin off my lips that I didn't realize how constant it was. I am very sensitive to toothpastes (flouride, etc) and mouthwash and the ingredients in this are perfect for me. I gushed about the results to my husband and he wanted to try it. In less than 4 days it repaired his lips 100%. They were so bad before. Like a little kid that has been outside all summer bad. I told him the price of getting a full size and he suggested getting 2. He could have cared less about any other lip product he's ever tried but this one is magic.
faceoff_positive.headline: perfect balm for a perfect pair

faceoff_negative.comments: I was so excited to buy this and even more excited that it came in metal packaging. However, the next day I learned fresh isn't cruelty free or vegan! SUPER BUMMED cause I wanted this to be my new staple lip product. Please stop testing on animals and go vegan, and then I'll be back. Won't be repurchasing until then. You can never go wrong with clean, cruelty free, vegan and eco friendly beauty products!!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: NOT CRUELTY FREE OR VEGAN

rollup.name: Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm
variant_names: Sugar Dream Lip Treatment Advanced Therapy
